title: Game

___name.description: Name of the tag. Should be as short as possible (~3 characters)

___description.description: A short description of the tag.

___created_at.description: Timestamp when the tag was added to the database.

____created_by.description: Reference to the user who created this tag. Only visible by contributors and above.

___id.description: Unique identifier for a tag. Gets generated automatically on creation.

___is_active.description: When creating a new tag, it first becomes inactive. When linking a release to the tag, it becomes active.
